title: Intro: Programming
desc: In this room, there are some simple programming challenges for you to try.

sections.title: Welcome!
sections.markdown:
Welcome to Laplace!

Laplace is an open-source, collaborative, and free coding environment for everyone to use. People can join rooms to learn about many topics and try challenges or even make their own rooms themselves.

This room has a set of very simple programming challenges to test yourself and your knowledge. Feel free to complete them with any of the languages supported, and finish all the challenges to complete this room!

Good luck!

sections.title: Hello, world!
sections.markdown:
#### **Learning Objectives:**
##### Learn how to print to the screen!
##### **Description:**
##### Hello, world!
##### Let's start off with a simple Hello, world! program.
#### **Input Format:**
#####  Your program's output should not change whether it receives any input or not.
#### **Output Format:**
`"Hello, world!"`

sections.title: Calculator
sections.markdown:
#### **Learning Objectives:**
##### Basic arithmetic and if else statements
##### **Description:**
##### Hello, world!
##### BEEP BOOP BEEP BEEP BOOP - Translation: Hey, Im BobBot. I have a test today for my Math class but my math.js file isn't working. I need you to create one for me. Use the word add for addition, sub for subtraction, mul for multiplication, and div for division.
#### **Sample Input:**
`23 3 add`

`33 3 sub`

`5 9 mul`

`16 4 div`
#### **Sample Output:**
`26`

`30`

`45`

`4`

sections.title: Fibonacci
sections.markdown:
#### **Description:**
#####	Ever heard of the Fibonacci sequence. If you haven't, it looks like this 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21 The concept behind this sequence is that your next number is the current number + the previous number. Create a program that gives you the nth term of Fibonacci.
#### **Sample Input:**
`0`

`1`

`2`

`3`

`7`

#### **Sample Output:**
`1`

`1`

`2`

`3`

`21`
